synopsis: Three thousand years ago, Bai Qiuran was accepted as a disciple by the Qingming Taoist, After three thousand years, his teacher become immortal, the elder fails to cross the bullet, even the youngest sister builds base successfully, But Bai Qiuran experienced three thousand years of penance still just stay in the refining period, actually, his refining period has reached a great level, no matter the opponent is a fairy god or devil, he can easily win. Through his tireless efforts, he finally broke through!
